H4853.def: literally: lifting up (one's) self; hence: = action by which humans turn to (other) humans with the confidence that they will find joy and comfort there

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H1834.def: = town; ◄ in {L:Syria<SDBH:אֲרָם>}; ► capital of one of the {L:Aramaean<SDBH:אֲרָם>} kingdoms

H4496.def: literally: rest; hence: = a state of mind in which humans find relief after a time of distress

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H7626.def: = stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, fighting, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H2574.def: = town, area; ◄ on Orontes river in {L:Syria<SDBH:אֲרָם>}; ► capital of {L:Aramean<SDBH:אֲרַמִּי>} kingdom; its inhabitants were relocated to {L:Samaria<SDBH:שֹׁמְרֹון>} by the king of {L:Assyria<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}

H1379.def: = state in which a particular geographical object forms the boundary of a certain area

H6865.def: = extremely hard type of stone that leaves sharp edges when fractured; ► can be used as knife; ≈ associated with an inflexible attitude

H6721.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}; presumably a personification of the city that played a prominent role in Canaanite culture and history

H2449.def: = state or process by which humans, deities, and animals possess or gain a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

H6865.def: = extremely hard type of stone that leaves sharp edges when fractured; ► can be used as knife; ≈ associated with an inflexible attitude

H1129.def: = causative action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

H4692.def: = state of severe sorrow or anguish

H6651.def: = causative action by which humans pile up large quantities of objects in one place

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H6083.def: = the loose natural substance of the earth's surface

H2916.def: = wet soil;◄ moistened by rain or because of its proximity to a body of water; ► can be used for pottery or bricks; ≈ regarded as cheap, easily obtainable and workable material for making basic items; otherwise as a valueless substance or an obstacle for movement

H2351.def: = referent to the location outside of an object

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H3423.def: = process by which humans gain ownership of land and other possessions, which often implies that these possessions will be passed on to the next generation

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H784.def: = state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

H831.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}; ► one of the five cities of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H3372.def: = state in which humans experience fear

H5804.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}; ► one of the fives cities of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}

H2342.def: = action by which humans delay action until the right moment, with a certain amount of confidence that this moment will actually come

H6138.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}; ► one of the fives cities of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}

H4007.def: = state in which humans experience a desire for something to happen, together with a degree of confidence that this desire will be fulfilled through the intervention of someone else

H954.def: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

H6.def: = state of not being located in the place where it is expected to be

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H4464.def: = a child born out of wedlock or from an unlawful marriage

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H795.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}; ► one of the fives cities of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H1347.def: = dense growth of shrubbery or small trees, habitat of animals

H6430.def: = inhabitant of {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}, considered to have come from {L:Kaphtor<SDBH:כַּפְתֹּור>}

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H8251.def: = an object that is regarded as unclean and therefore treated as utterly detestable

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H441.def: = person in a position of leadership over a tribe or clan

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H6138.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Philistia<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}; ► one of the fives cities of the {L:Philistines<SDBH:פְּלֶשֶׁת>}

132.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H2583.def: = state in which an individual or group of people dwells at a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H5065.def: = a person who forces humans and animals to perform certain activities

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H1523.def: mainly in poetical texts: = state in which humans feel and show great joy

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H6662.def: = state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

H3467.def: = action by which humans or deities help themselves in a (difficult) situation

H6041.def: = a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility

H7392.def: = action by which humans ride on a domestic animal such as a {L:donkey<SDBH:חֲמֹור>} or a {L:horse<SDBH:סוּס>} or in a {L:chariot<SDBH:מֶרְכָּבָה>}

H2543.def: = domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see {L:עַיִר<SDBH:עַיִר>}; female see {L:אָתֹון<SDBH:אָתֹון>}

H5895.def: = young male {L:donkey<SDBH:חֲמֹור>}; ≈ possibly associated with liveliness and unruliness

H860.def: = large, strong, female {L:donkey<SDBH:חֲמֹור>} ► used for riding

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H7393.def: = upper stone of two stones ► that are used to grind grain into flour; the grain was placed on the stationary bottom stone, and the top stone was pressed down on top of the grain and scraped back and forth

H669.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5483.def: = large domesticated solid-hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H7198.def: = a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H4915.def: = something that is similar in shape or character to something else

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H1285.def: = a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H615.def: = person who is locked up in a prison or other location where one does not have the freedom to act and go at will

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H953.def: = a place where water wells up from an underground source

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H1225.def: = a fortified town, or a fortified place within a town or on its walls

H615.def: = person who is locked up in a prison or other location where one does not have the freedom to act and go at will

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H4932.def: = state in which something has twice its normal size, quantity, frequency, or intensity

H1869.def: = action by which humans or animals move forward by lifting and setting down each foot in turn

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H7198.def: = a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H669.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5782.def: = process by which someone wakes up from his sleep

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H3120.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Japheth<SDBH:יֶפֶת>}; ► considered the founder of a nation with the same name

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

41.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H2671.def: = pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H1300.def: = process by which bright flashes of light are seen between clouds and the ground or within clouds, often accompanied by thunder; ≈ regarded as fire from heaven and arrows or spears from God

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H3069.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7782.def: = a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H8486.def: = area located to the south of a point of reference

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H1598.def: = causative action by which a deity keeps people or town safe from harm or injury, as with a shield

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H3533.def: literally: to be trodden underfoot; hence: = state in which land has come under someone's authority or control, usually after having been conquered with force

H68.def: = hard, heavy, and strong substance, ◄ very commonly found in nature,  ► which can be hewn into different shapes by a craftsman

H7050.def: = weapon consisting of two strings with a {L:pouch<SDBH:כַּף>} in the middle;◄ made of leather; ► a {L:stone<SDBH:אֶבֶן>} is placed in the pouch, the sling is twirled and one string released to propel the stone; used to hunt or to chase away wild animals, or to attack an enemy

H1993.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects produce a variety of sounds, often associated with animals, but also with natural phenomena like the waves of a stormy sea

H3644.def: = fire; ≈ associated with God's punishment, which is too heavy for humans to bear

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H4219.def: = metal container large enough to dip in with one's hands; ► used for sprinkling liquids such as water and blood

H2106.def: = a place or angle where two or more sides or edges meet

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3467.def: = action by which humans or deities help themselves in a (difficult) situation

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H68.def: = hard, heavy, and strong substance, ◄ very commonly found in nature,  ► which can be hewn into different shapes by a craftsman

H5145.def: = state in which humans have been set apart for the service of God

H5264.def: exact meaning unknown; literally, possibly: to melt; hence: = state in which humans gradually lose their strength and pine away as a result of sickness

H127.def: = the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H2898.def: = state in which objects are of a high quality and/or a pleasure to look at

H3308.def: = state in which the outward appearance of humans or objects is pleasing to the eye

H1715.def: = seeds of cultivated cereal; ► used as food

H970.def: = a young, fully grown, unmarried male ► associated with joy and strength

H5107.def: literally: to bear fruit; hence: process by which humans produce the evidence of a certain quality by their actions

H8492.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of newly harvested grapes and possibly still at the beginning of the fermentation process; ► used as beverage and for sacrifice; ≈ represents the entire range of agricultural products in Israel, together with grain and oil; associated with joy and well-being, and only once with drunkenness and foolishness{N:001}

H1330.def: = young unmarried woman, who has never been married before, and has never had sex with a man
